hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a solitary #Cow#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Did you know that Blue Fire destroys mud walls and detonates Bomb Flowers?

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #Morpha#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Fire Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ GS Lizalfos Room

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Like Like Pot 2

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the symphony room# in the Spirit Temple protects...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Symphony Room Chest
Spirit Temple MQ GS Symphony Room

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Gerudo Training Ground# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Green Potion Bottle#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.
